document_data.name: Arathane
document_data.race: [[Stormsoul genasi]]<ref group="note">Arathane is said to be a [[windsoul genasi]] in "''Explore Airspur''" ([[Dragon magazine 377]]), but she is said to be a stormsoul genasi in [[The Spectral Blaze]] (chapter 5) and [[Sword of the Gods]] (chapter 16). There is the possibility that she has a double manifestation and is both a windsoul and stormsoul genasi.
document_data.mainbody: '''Queen Arathane''' was a [[stormsoul genasi]]{{Cite digital book/Sword of the Gods||Chapter 16}} and the ruler of [[Akan没l]] in [[1479 DR]].
document_data.Appearance: Arathane was a stunningly beautiful genasi with lavender skin. Unlike other genasi of [[Abeir]]an descent, her silvery ''szuldar'' lines were almost non-existent.

Relationships.Personal: Arathane was the daughter of [[Cyndra]],{{Cite digital book/Sword of the Gods|Chapter 16}} As of 1479 DR, she was approaching her fourth decade of life, remaining unmarried, and was besieged by would-be suitors. Arathane was in no hurry to bear a successor, as both her mother and grandmother bore children late in life.
Relationships.Political: Arathane was considered a fair and just ruler by her subjects, and praised publicly for continuing the policies of her mother, although she had a difficult relationship with the nobility and was frequently opposed by the [[Four Stewards]]. Queen Arathane was always searching for alternatives to circumvent the ''"Covenant of Stewardship"'', such as secretly endorsing and employing the [[Firestorm Cabal]].{{Cite dragon/377/Explore Airspur|62}}

document_data.Rumors: It was rumored that Arathane had a secret on-again-off-again affair with one of the commanders of the Firestorm Cabal, that would endanger both of them if it became public knowledge.
